title: Cornwall fights BT over outsourcing deal
text:
Welcome to your preview of The Times Subscribe now Cornwall fights BT over outsourcing deal The outsourcing deal for the Duchy of Cornwall was signed with BT’s Global Services division Getty Images Google+ 1 of 1 The outsourcing deal for the Duchy of Cornwall was signed with BT’s Global Services division Getty Images Nic Fildes Technology & Communications Editor Last updated at 12:01AM, September 3 2015 
Cornwall has been held up as a test bed for how local authorities can work hand in hand with BT to speed up the roll-out of superfast broadband to the most rural parts of the country. Yet the duchy’s council has spectacularly come to blows with the telecoms company over an outsourcing deal that has gone awry.
